content: purchasable pdf pattern https //www etsy com/listing/554798505/crochet-hudsons-bay-baby-sweater this sweater is approximately a 2t the arms measured 11 inches from the shoulder to the wrist 12 inches across the shoulders and about 14 inches from shoulder to mid thigh materials * one skein each of caron simply soft in sage autumn red gold charcoal heather three skeins of off-white * tapestry needle * scissors * 4 stitch markers * size i 5 5mm hook
